Trade/Device Name(s): Nova Max Plus Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System
Nova Max Plus β-Ketone Test Strips
Nova Max Plus β-Ketone Control Solutions
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Nova Max Plus Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitor
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Nova Max Plus Blood Glucose and β-Ketone Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose and β-hydroxybutyrate in fresh capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose or β-hydroxybutyrate in fresh capillary whole blood by people with diabetes mellitus at home and by healthcare professionals in clinical settings; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
